Basic.title: Introduction to C
Basic.data: C is a general-purpose programming language that is extremely popular and widely used.
Basic.description: C is a foundational programming language that has influenced many others. It is known for its efficiency and control, making it suitable for system programming and embedded systems.

Basic.title: C Basics Overview
Basic.data: An overview of the basics of C programming, including syntax and key concepts.
Basic.description: Provides an introductory overview of key concepts in C.

Intermediate.title: Intermediate C Concepts
Intermediate.data: Dive into intermediate topics like arrays, strings, and pointers.
Intermediate.description: Learn more about using arrays and pointers in C.

Advanced.title: Advanced C Programming
Advanced.data: Advanced topics like memory management and file handling in C.
Advanced.description: Focus on advanced techniques such as dynamic memory allocation and efficient file handling.

Basic.title: Understanding Data Types
Basic.data: Learn about fundamental data types in C.
Basic.description: Introduction to integers, floats, characters, and more.

Basic.title: Variables in C
Basic.data: Explore how variables are declared and used.

Intermediate.title: Derived Data Types
Intermediate.data: Learn about arrays, pointers, and function pointers.
Intermediate.description: An in-depth look at derived types in C.

Advanced.title: User-Defined Data Types
Advanced.data: Learn about structures, unions, and typedef in C.
Advanced.description: Create complex data types using structures and unions.

Basic.title: Basic If-Else
Basic.data: Understanding the fundamentals of conditional statements in C.
Basic.description: A basic overview of if-else statements.

Intermediate.title: Nested If-Else
Intermediate.data: Learn about nesting multiple if-else statements.
Intermediate.description: Understanding nested conditional logic in C.

Advanced.title: Complex Conditional Logic
Advanced.data: Explore advanced conditional logic with multiple branches.
Advanced.description: Handling complex conditions effectively in C programs.

Basic.title: Introduction to Loops
Basic.data: An overview of looping constructs in C.
Basic.description: C loops allow repetitive execution of code blocks.

Intermediate.title: Intermediate Looping Techniques
Intermediate.data: Using nested loops and optimizing loop performance.
Intermediate.description: Learn about advanced loop usage and efficiency.

Advanced.title: Advanced Loop Concepts
Advanced.data: Creating dynamic and efficient looping constructs.
Advanced.description: Master advanced looping techniques in C.

Basic.title: Function Basics
Basic.data: Learn what functions are and how to define them.
Basic.description: An introduction to defining and using functions in C.

Intermediate.title: Parameter Passing
Intermediate.data: Explore different ways to pass parameters to functions.

Advanced.title: Recursive Functions
Advanced.data: Learn how to use recursion effectively in C.
Advanced.description: Explore advanced topics like tail recursion and stack optimization.

Basic.title: What are Pointers?
Basic.data: Learn about the concept of pointers in C.
Basic.description: Introduction to the basics of pointers and memory addressing.

Intermediate.title: Pointer Arithmetic
Intermediate.data: Learn about pointer operations and array manipulation.
Intermediate.description: Explore pointer arithmetic and its practical uses.

Advanced.title: Dynamic Memory Management
Advanced.data: Learn how to manage memory using malloc and free.
Advanced.description: Handle memory allocation and deallocation dynamically.

Basic.title: Introduction to File Handling
Basic.data: Learn how to read and write files in C.
Basic.description: Basic operations like opening, reading, and writing files.

Intermediate.title: Binary Files
Intermediate.data: Explore working with binary files in C.
Intermediate.description: Understand how to read and write binary data.

Advanced.title: File Streams and Buffers
Advanced.data: Learn advanced techniques for handling file streams.
Advanced.description: Optimize file operations using advanced stream techniques.
